title: A Very Hairy Adventure
description: Slade and his friends are always on the lookout for fun and adventure. When they hear about a marauding werewolf it seems perfectly suited to their needs. But will the teens be able to prevail when they actually come face to face with the beast? The first of a series of short stories related to the characters from Kaynos as highlighted in Erich's Book One of the Witchcraft Wars
author: Tracey Alley
